job.description: <p>Accountant<br><br></p><p><strong>Accountant Opening - Houston, TX<br><br></strong></p><p><span> <br> Our recruitment firm is seeking trustworthy Accountant to work for our client, a global manufacturing company. <span>To ensure success, the Accountant should be prompt, honest, detail-oriented, professional, and analytical. </span>Candidates should have a firm grasp of accounting and financial practices and regulations and possess strong computer skills. <span>If you are looking for a career change with a great team environment, this is the job for you! <br></span> <br> </span><span><br> <br><br><br><br></span></p>Accountant Duties and Responsibilities:<br><br><ul><li><span>Maintain general ledger</span></li><li><span>Prepare budgets</span></li><li><span>Financial reconciliation</span></li><li><span>Profit and loss for multiple entities</span></li><li><span>Perform month end closing </span></li><li><span>Report Sales Tax monthly</span></li><li><span>Maintain Account Receivable</span></li><li><span>Code Account payable for all vendors' bills<br><br></span></li></ul>Accountant Preferred Education, Experience, &amp; Requirements:<br><br><ul><li><span>Bachelor's in accounting</span></li><li><span>2-5 years of relevant experience in Accounting</span></li><li><span>Proficient with MS Office products including excellent Excel skills</span></li><li><span>Microsoft Dynamics preferred</span></li><li><span>Great communication skills</span></li><li><span>Team player</span></li></ul><p> <br><br></p><p>HOUAC49<br><br></p><p></p>
